1.1.0: New: Browser Title Logging (Chrome, Zen, Edge, etc.)
New: Dynamic Browser Configuration (add/remove custom browsers)
Improved: Wider stats tables (53 chars) for better visibility
Improved: Generic window title cleaning for cleaner logs
1.1.1: Performance: SQLite Optimized for low memory usage
1.2.0: Feature: Browser Tab Title Tracking (tracks active tab across browsers)
Feature: Smart App Grouping [EXPERIMENTAL] (YouTube, Instagram, GitHub, etc.)
Architecture: Restored net/http for reliable self-update
Architecture: Repository interface pattern for testability
Performance: Native process checks via CreateToolhelp32Snapshot
Feature: Graceful update flow (stop daemon → update → restart)
Security: Removed UPX compression (prevents AV false positives)
1.3.0: Feature: Actionable Notifications (OK to snooze, Cancel to dismiss)
Feature: Configurable Snooze Duration (default 60min, adjustable in menu)
Feature: Break Reminder repeats every interval
Feature: App Limit notifies on each switch to over-limit app
Feature: Password Recovery via 'focusd reset-password' command
Improved: Dead code cleanup and optimized ExtractAppCategory
